FuncDef: The display ospf flush-source-trace analysis-info command displays information about definitely and possibly faulty nodes identified by OSPF flush LSA source tracing. The display ospf flush-source-trace analysis-info command displays information about definitely and possibly faulty nodes identified by OSPF flush LSA source tracing.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies an area ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies an area ID.
The value is an IP address ranging from 0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255.

ExtraInfo: To check information about definitely and possibly faulty nodes identified by OSPF flush LSA source tracing, run the display ospf flush-source-trace analysis-info command. The identified definitely and possibly faulty nodes are prioritized in descending order in the command output, which helps maintenance personnel locate the faulty nodes and isolate them in time.
